attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it's time we took the weed off the streets and made it so people who need it for pain relieve and other problems to do with health.i have got ideas that would put a stop to the street dealer and bring a very good amount of money to the government and im talking 100,s of thousands.it just needs to be addressed differently thats all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
